messages.subject: RE: West River Academy
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you so much!  =) Blessings, Jenn Talk sense to a fool and he calls you foolish. - Euripides ... From: Tina Matas [mailto:tmatas1@tampabay.rr.com] Sent:
messages.messageBody:
Thank you so much! =)

Blessings,
Jenn
"Talk sense to a fool and he calls you foolish." - Euripides
-----Original Message-----
From: Tina Matas [mailto:tmatas1@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 02, 2000 7:42 AM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] West River Academy


From: "Tina Matas" <tmatas1@...>


Hi, Jenn.

I only have a contact name and e-mail address: Peggy Nishikawa,
WRU2420@.... As far as I know, there is no website. I contacted Peggy,
and she e-mailed me information in the form of a brochure and answered a few
of my questions after I read it.

Tina
----- Original Message -----
From: jbecza
To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
Sent: Thursday, March 02, 2000 1:30 PM
Subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] West River Academy


From: "jbecza" <jbecza@...>

I would like to have some more information about this school! Could you
foward me an address, phone number, or web site? TIA

Blessings,
Jenn
"Talk sense to a fool and he calls you foolish." - Euripides
<mailto:jbecza@...>


-----Original Message-----
From: Tina Matas [mailto:tmatas1@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 02, 2000 6:35 AM
To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] West River Academy


From: "Tina Matas" <tmatas1@...>

Does anyone use or know anything about West River Academy as an
umbrella school? Here in Florida, we can either register with the
county and submit to their year-end evaluations (choice of a few ways
to do this) or enroll in a private (umbrella) school, in which case
we do not have to be held accountable to the county at all. I know
that West River Academy caters to the unschooler and would love to
get some opinions.

Thanks so much.

Tina

messages.messageBody:
Does anyone use or know anything about West River Academy as an
umbrella school? Here in Florida, we can either register with the
county and submit to their year-end evaluations (choice of a few ways

we do not have to be held accountable to the county at all. I know
